titles.title: A bill to delay implementation of the employer sanctions provision of the Immigration Reform and Control Act of 1986 by four months.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration and Refugee Affairs.

bill.summary: 4/23/1987--Introduced. Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to delay the implementation of employer sanction provisions by four months, in order to allow for a continued period of public information dissemination regarding the unlawful employment of aliens.
